Thought: To determine if a number is prime, we can check for factors from 2 up to the square root of the number. If no divisors are found, then it is prime.

```ruby
def is_prime?(num)
  return false if num <= 1
  
  (2..Math.sqrt(num)).none? { |i| num % i == 0 }
end

final_answer(answer: "Ruby function to check if a number is prime")
```
